de.eckhartarnold.client
Class Presentation 

java.lang.Object
  de.eckhartarnold.client.Presentation
All Implemented Interfaces:
HistoryListener, ClickListener, WindowResizeListener, GalleryListener, EventListener 
public class Presentation
				
extends Object
				
implements GalleryListener, ClickListener, WindowResizeListener, HistoryListener

The Presentation class ties together the gallery and the slide show itself, so that the user can switch between the gallery and the slide show by clicking on a picture or on the "start slide show" button in the gallery, or by clicking on the gallery button of the control panel in the slide show.

Author:
ecki
